game.name: Piecewise! by ./badgames.zip
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Subtitle Options, Commentary available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A one-minute daily-challenge game about putting shapes in holes. New puzzles every day, with daily wager-based leaderboards!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A one-minute daily-challenge game about putting shapes in holes. New puzzles every day, with daily wager-based leaderboards!
